pages.text: $(li)You can just throw the egg away right clicking while you are holding an Egg on your hand.$(br)$(li)When the egg hits a block, this one has a little possibility of make a tiny Emu appears.

$(li)Emu Eggs are a valious ingredient for a numerous kind of food recipes.$(br)$(li)Pie$(li)Cake$(li)Tart$(li)Pancake$(li)Pudding$(li)Scrambled Egg$(li)Fried egg$(li)Boiled Emu Egg$(li)Aether-Glazed Cupcake
